conversations.conversation: I am a born again child of God and a man of God serving the Lord in the Ministry of Intercession and Deliverance. A graduate of THE HILLTOP MINISTERIAL BIBLE COLLEGE PORT HARCOURT. For me my believe is that Love is stronger than Lust, I desired to be loved purely and I`ll love him or her purely too. I am married with wonderful children, but I know I can be an encouragement to someone and someone to me
